alert.note: Alert for Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 4:38AM EST until January 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected with the intensity of the snow picking up this afternoon into this evening. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause very low visibilities tonight with blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Menominee County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
